original_text: He cropped off the top of his young twigs, and carried it into a land of traffick; he set it in a city of merchants.
korean_text: 그 연한 가지 끝을 꺾어 가지고 장사하는 땅에 이르러 상인의 성읍에 두고

sentences.original_text: He cropped off the top of his young twigs
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 어린 가지의 꼭대기를 잘라냈다

sentences.original_text: and carried it into a land of traffick
he set it in a city of merchants
